description: Describes the certificate that's identified by the CertificateId.

parameters.name: CertificateId
parameters.description: An array of identifiers for the imported certificates. You use this identifier for working with profiles and partner profiles.

nested_items.name: Certificate
nested_items.description: The details for the specified certificate, returned as an object.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the certificate.

nested_items.name: CertificateId
nested_items.description: An array of identifiers for the imported certificates. You use this identifier for working with profiles and partner profiles.

nested_items.name: Usage
nested_items.description: Specifies how this certificate is used. It can be used in the following ways:
SIGNING: For signing AS2 messages.
ENCRYPTION: For encrypting AS2 messages.
TLS: For securing AS2 communications sent over HTTPS.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: A certificate's status can be either ACTIVE or INACTIVE.

nested_items.name: Certificate
nested_items.description: The file name for the certificate.

nested_items.name: CertificateChain
nested_items.description: The list of certificates that make up the chain for the certificate.

nested_items.name: ActiveDate
nested_items.description: An optional date that specifies when the certificate becomes active. If you do not specify a value, ActiveDate takes the same value as NotBeforeDate, which is specified by the CA.

nested_items.name: InactiveDate
nested_items.description: An optional date that specifies when the certificate becomes inactive. If you do not specify a value, InactiveDate takes the same value as NotAfterDate, which is specified by the CA.

nested_items.name: Serial
nested_items.description: The serial number for the certificate.

nested_items.name: NotBeforeDate
nested_items.description: The earliest date that the certificate is valid.

nested_items.name: NotAfterDate
nested_items.description: The final date that the certificate is valid.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: If a private key has been specified for the certificate, its type is CERTIFICATE_WITH_PRIVATE_KEY. If there is no private key, the type is CERTIFICATE.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The name or description that's used to identity the certificate.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Key-value pairs that can be used to group and search for certificates.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The name assigned to the tag that you create.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Contains one or more values that you assigned to the key name you create.
